description: The results from the test evaluation of property measurement of the testable object property of the testable object per the test specifications shall be presented as test results. A test result reports the measured results and evaluation of test specification criteria from a test for a specific person, piece of equipment, physical asset, material lot or material sublot
title: Test result
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The child test result(s) of this test result
The measurement obtained for each testable object property
The operations test requirement object applied to execute the test and generate the test result
The tested object recorded by this test result

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the test result

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

evaluationDate.title: Evaluation date
evaluationDate.description: Date and time of evaluation of the test result

evaluatedCriterionResult.title: Evaluated criterion result
evaluatedCriterionResult.description: Result obtained from evaluation of the associated test specification criteria.

otherEvaluatedCriterionResult.title: Other evaluated criterion result
otherEvaluatedCriterionResult.description: Not part of the Standard. But makes 'evaluatedCriterionResult' property value list extensible

expiration.title: Expiration
expiration.description: Date of the expiration of the test result criteria
